dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S2243 IS: Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson (for himself, Mr. Donnelly, Mr. Coats, and Ms. Baldwin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the fresh fruit and vegetable program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to include canned, dried, frozen, or pureed fruits and vegetables.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fruit and Vegetable Access for Children Act.

Section 19 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1769a) is amended by inserting , canned, dried, frozen, or pureed after fresh each place it appears in each of subsections (a), (b), and (e).
